title: Adding more notes
text:
I love God! I love Lord Krishna and Lord Siva!
God, keep me same as now, irrespective of what situation I may be put under.
That is my honest and humblest prayer for you.
I don't want to be sinful even when I fall into some mental health issue that is beyond my control.

title: 14th note
text: Sastram teach us and protects us from artha kama. The dharma is taught to remove the artha kama desires. Earning and enjoying is called "Kaithavam", dangerous for soceity.
